name: Certified Forklift Driver: CYOA
description:
You are now a certified Forklift Driver. Embark on a journey of working at a Warehouse.

Create and choose your own adventure, based on driving forklifts at your new warehouse job. Create your character. Choose to work safely, or not. Learn more about the world you live in. Don't forget to show off your new skills and certification. And most importantly, have fun!

This is my first time making 'interactive fiction'. Game create in Twine, using Sugarcube. Plan is for continuous updates and improving story/gameplay over time (10/18/22). This interactive game is still in development.
